update oas_meeting
meeting_title = #{meetingTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_type = #{meetingType,jdbcType=CHAR},

meeting_content = #{meetingContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where meeting_id = #{meetingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
